resources.string: How many quotes do you want to see in a day?
You will receive lock screen notifications during
You will soon start to receive daily quotes on your lock screen right after you unlock your phone

We need your permission to show daily quotes when you unlock your phone \n\nAfter you click "Continue", you will be redirected to your phone\'s settings page. Please grant the permission as illustrated above

Since you did not grant the permission, daily quotes will not be displayed on your lock screen.

Instead, you will be able to view quotes by clicking daily notifications. 

Please note that you can grant this permission later in the settings section
